entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You succeeded in finding the Black Sun spy.
entries.journal_entry_description: You have been instructed to look for Black Sun hiding among a fleet of mining vessels.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Use the space terminal to launch into space.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Find the Black Sun hiding among the mining vessels.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Return to Laetin to report your failure.
entries.task02_journal_entry_title: You Failed Your Mission, Return to Laetin
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Report to Laetin of your success.
entries.task03_journal_entry_title: Land and Report back to Laetin
